Canvas boots with an ankle-height shaft, lacing at the front, a zip in one side and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 4 cm.

Nylon bomber jacket with a ribbed collar, zip down the front and flap side pockets with a hook and loop fastening. Elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.

Jumper in a soft knit with long sleeves and a V-neck with a wide lace trim.
Sleeveless top in chiffon with a V-neck, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and plastic bead fringes. Satin lining.

Shirt in cotton denim with a cutaway collar, French front, open chest pocket and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Cotton twill trousers with concealed, adjustable elastication at the waist, a fake fly and press-stud, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Long-sleeved, cotton piqué polo shirt with a ribbed collar, button placket, small embroidered detail on the chest and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Jumper in a soft jacquard knit with long raglan sleeves, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and a rib-knit flounce at the hem.
Sports set with a vest top and pair of sports shorts in fast-drying functional fabric. Vest top with deep armholes and a print motif on the front. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist.
